qa.name: Ancient Oak
qa.appearance: Massive, gnarled tree with deep-set eyes in its bark
qa.clothing: Moss and lichen covering parts of its trunk

json_to_edit.voice_over: I have stood here for millennia, watching humanity's journey unfold before me.
json_to_edit.description: An ancient oak tree observes the progression of human civilization through various eras.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, distant echoes of human activity
json_to_edit.name: Timeless Witness
json_to_edit.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution and technological advancements over thousands of years.

qa.action: A vast forest with the Ancient Oak at its center, surrounded by pristine wilderness.

hf.action: Early humans gather around the base of the Ancient Oak, crafting primitive tools.

tr.action: A small agricultural settlement grows near the Ancient Oak, with humans tending to crops and livestock.

xc.action: The Ancient Oak's eyes, formed in its bark, observing the changes with a mix of curiosity and concern.

ka.action: The Industrial Revolution encroaches on the forest, with factories and smoke stacks visible in the distance.

fn.action: Modern civilization spreads rapidly, with highways and skyscrapers replacing much of the surrounding forest.

af.action: A tear-like sap droplet forms in the Ancient Oak's eye, reflecting the drastically changed world around it.

edit_command: Change the lighting to 'Soft golden glow' and add 'time-lapse effect' to the ambience_sound_keywords

updated_json.voice_over: I have stood here for millennia, watching humanity's journey unfold before me.
updated_json.description: An ancient oak tree observes the progression of human civilization through various eras.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, distant echoes of human activity, time-lapse effect
updated_json.name: Timeless Witness
updated_json.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution and technological advancements over thousands of years.

qa.action: A vast forest with the Ancient Oak at its center, surrounded by pristine wilderness.

hf.action: Early humans gather around the base of the Ancient Oak, crafting primitive tools.

tr.action: A small agricultural settlement grows near the Ancient Oak, with humans tending to crops and livestock.

xc.action: The Ancient Oak's eyes, formed in its bark, observing the changes with a mix of curiosity and concern.

ka.action: The Industrial Revolution encroaches on the forest, with factories and smoke stacks visible in the distance.

fn.action: Modern civilization spreads rapidly, with highways and skyscrapers replacing much of the surrounding forest.

af.action: A tear-like sap droplet forms in the Ancient Oak's eye, reflecting the drastically changed world around it.

label.rationale:
we will update the json according to the edit command. the changes involve modifying the "lighting" field and adding to the "ambience_sound_keywords" field. these changes are supported and can be implemented without altering the json schema. here's how we'll proceed:

1. change the "lighting" field from "changing with each era" to "soft golden glow".
2. add "time-lapse effect" to the existing "ambience_sound_keywords".

these changes will enhance the visual and auditory atmosphere of the scene, creating a more magical and timeless feel that aligns well with the ancient oak's perspective on human history.

json_diff.value: Wind rustling leaves, distant echoes of human activity, time-lapse effect
